channel.title: Strat's Cocktails on Strat
channel.description: Recent content in Strat's Cocktails on Strat

item.title: White Night
item.description: Smooth and sweet but not too sweet.

item.title: Azul Gigante
item.description: Refreshing big blue drink. Dangerously easy to drink.

item.title: White Boy
item.description: Smooth and sweet but not too sweet.

item.title: Lemony Snicket
item.description: Tastes like lemon, a little sour but not too sour.

item.title: Mojito
item.description: Light and refreshing. Feels great to sip outside on a hot summer day.

item.title: Tequila Sunrise
item.description: My new favorite drink. Fresh orange juice is amazing, tequila is amazing, grenadine is amazing, this drink is amazing.

item.title: Gin-Gin Mule
item.description: Tastes like a less minty and more gingery Southside cocktail. It’s dayum good.

item.title: Dark and Stormy
item.description: Dark rum combined with stormy (?) ginger beer. A storm of flavors… In your mouth.

item.title: Sweet Devil
item.description: A fruity sweet and sour drink. A lot of flavors in every sip.

item.title: Kamikrazy
item.description: A variation on the “Kamikaze” cocktail. I’m not too crazy about it. Be warned, it’s very strong.

item.title: Sky Tai
item.description: A (slight) variation on the Mai Tai, a classic tropical cocktail that will make you feel like you’re a pensioner living in Florida.

item.title: Green Man's Whiskers
item.description: Very green but tastes very orangey. The gin combined with the two types of vermouth and the orange juice and liqueur gives this cocktail a unique flavor that’s hard to describe.

item.title: Southside Cocktail
item.description: The mint garnish pokes at your nose while you drink this minty cocktail. If you like mint with your mint for more mint per square mint then this is the cocktail for you.

item.title: Negroni
item.description: It tastes like mouthwash? But I like it?

item.title: Fruity Old Fashioned
item.description: An old fashioned is the preferred way of making bourbon enjoyable to drink.

item.title: Pina Colada
item.description: I didn’t use ripe pineapple and that messes up the cocktail. I’m going to have to try this one again…

item.title: Whiskey Sour
item.description: Another way to make bourbon enjoyable to drink.

item.title: Gimlet
item.description: Limey and Giney. This drink prevents scurvy and that would be relevant information for you if you were a sailor 100+ years ago.

item.title: Homemade Ginger Beer
item.description: My homebrewed ginger beer recipe. It’s really good.

item.title: Mint Julep
item.description: I don’t like this drink.

item.title: Moscow Mule
item.description: TBD
